meanings.sent1: She stood tall and unintimidated in front of the bully.
meanings.sent2: The brave knight remained unintimidated by the dragon's fiery breath.
meanings.sent3: Even the loud thunderstorm couldn't make her feel unintimidated.
meanings.sent4: Her unwavering gaze was as unintimidated as a lion's stare.
meanings.sent5: The fearless explorer ventured into the dark cave, unintimidated by the unknown.

meanings.sent1: The fearless leader led the team with an unintimidated demeanor.
meanings.sent2: The sprinter was unintimidated by the competition, sprinting towards the finish line.
meanings.sent3: The cat approached the cucumber with an unintimidated curiosity.
meanings.sent4: Her unwavering determination was as unintimidated as a charging bull.
meanings.sent5: The young child faced the unfamiliar task with an unintimidated spirit, ready to conquer it.
